instruction: Offer one suggestion to improve work productivity.
output: Try breaking tasks into smaller chunks, setting achievable goals throughout the day, and taking regular breaks to maintain focus and energy.

instruction: Suggest an activity for a family picnic.
output: Frisbee, Kickball, Volleyball, Scavenger Hunts, Limbo, Corntoss, Sack Races, Capture the Flag.

instruction: Generate a creative story about a character who lives in a village with a secret.
output:
Once upon a time, there lived a young girl in a small village deep in a secluded wood. The village was filled with beautiful greenery and people of all ages living side by side. But behind all of that beauty, the village was keeping a big secret. It was said that the village was home to a mythical creature, living deep below the village and only coming out at night. No one knew what kind of creature it was, but they knew they had to keep it safe and hidden.

For years the villagers had a secret agreement that they would protect the creature and not tell anyone about it. They would hunt for it in the night and offer it food, but never dared to speak of it during the day. But one day a curious young girl found the secret and began to tell everyone about it.

No one knew what would happen when the secret was out, but the villagers didn't have time to find out. Before long, the creature had disappeared, never to be seen again. Even though the creature was gone, the myth still lives on in the village and its secret lives on too.

instruction: Generate a catchy headline about a new technology.
output: Introducing a Revolutionary New Technology: Transforming the Way We Live, Work and Play!

instruction: Create a Facebook post that encourages online shopping.
output: Shop online and skip the hassle of commuting to the store! Get everything you need delivered right at your doorstep with just a few clicks! #ShopOnline #NoMoreTraffic

instruction: Wrap up the following statement in a humorous way.
output: Chores? No, thank you! Ain't nobody got time for that!

instruction: Generate a riddle about an owl.
output: What comes out at night without being called and is forgotten by the morning? An owl of course!

instruction: Compare depression to an ocean.
output: Depression is like an ocean. A seemingly vast expanse full of dark, crippling depths and strong, turbulent waves that can drag you down and make it seem like there is no hope for the future.

instruction: Come up with a detailed plan to clean a kitchen.
output:
Step 1: Put away all dishes, utensils and other food items.
Step 2: Clean countertops and cabinet doors.
Step 3: Clean stove, oven and microwave.
Step 4: Clean refrigerator inside and out.
Step 5: Sweep and mop floors.
Step 6: Empty trash and put in a new bag
Step 7: Clean windows, light fixtures and wall hangings.
Step 8: Wipe down baseboards and door frames
Step 9: Polish any metal surfaces (faucets, knobs, handles, etc.)
Step 10: Vacuum any carpets.

instruction: Name a movie that features a protagonist with a disability.
output: The silence of the Lambs (1991) features Clarice Starling, a young FBI agent with a hearing impairment.

instruction: Think of a creative way to persuade people to recycle.
output: Start a recycling challenge - turn it into a friendly competition between friends, family and neighbors to see who can recycle the most!

instruction: Construct an email to a prospective employer introducing yourself and your qualifications.
output:
Dear [Employer Name],

I am [Your Name], and I am writing to apply for the role of [Job Role], as advertised on [Where you found the job listing].

I have [Number of years] of experience in [Field], and I am confident that I possess the necessary skills to be successful in this role. My [specialised skills related to the role] are particularly pertinent to the role.

Furthermore, I am a team player who is always keen to learn new things. I believe my work ethic is integral to my success in any environment.

I look forward to discussing the position further, and I am available for an interview at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,
[Your name]

instruction: Explain the core concepts of Machine Learning to an audiences consisting of a layman.
output: Machine Learning is a type of artificial intelligence (AI) that allows computers to learn and make predictions. It works by providing computers with data and algorithms which they can use to identify patterns in the data and then identify cause and effect relationships. This allows the computer to behave in a more 'intelligent' way, by making better predictions, or learning from experience. Machine Learning can be used in a variety of applications such as speech recognition, image recognition, recommendation systems, and natural language processing.

instruction: Make a funny analogy comparing two unrelated things.
output: Using the internet is like trying to drink from a fire hose. You can get plenty of information very quickly, but it can be overwhelming and you can get overwhelmed easily.

instruction: Select the best website font from the 3 options given and provide a brief explanation for your choice.
output: I would choose Montserrat as the best website font option. Montserrat is a modern sans serif font with a clean look, great legibility, and a contemporary feel. It is also uniquely versatile and can be used for both body and headings. Furthermore, it is compatible with most web browsers which makes it ideal for a website font.

instruction: Organize these items in alphabetical order.
input: cedar tree, hummingbird, jaguar, oak tree
output: cedar tree, hummingbird, jaguar, oak tree

instruction: Classify the mood of the text given below.
input: The grass is green and the sky is blue; warmth radiates from the sun in the middle of the day
output: The mood of the text is optimistic and content.

instruction: Briefly describe the business model of Amazon.
output: Amazon operates on a business model of providing an online marketplace, acting as an intermediary between buyers and sellers. It generates revenues through commissions and fees charged to sellers, sales of services, Amazon Prime membership fees, and advertisements.

instruction: Convert the decimal number 0.425 into a fraction.
output: 0.425 can be written as the fraction 17/40.

instruction: Assemble the parts below to create a coherent story.
input:
Once there was a  
koala who was afraid of heights
but had always dreamed of 
flying like a bird
output: Once there was a koala who was afraid of heights, but had always dreamed of flying like a bird. So she decided to take the chance and built a contraption that would allow her to soar through the sky with the help of a homemade propeller. Every day she would bravely test out her device, each time tweaking it a bit more until she could finally fly as high as the birds.
